titleStmt.title: La noche buena
Negativas tomadas del 24 al 25 de diciembre de 1882

sourceDesc.bibl: "La Noche Buena." In: Los fuereños y La Noche Buena : dos novelas por Facundo (José T. de Cuellar). Biblioteca Digital Hispánica, bdh0000112794, http://bdh.bne.es/bnesearch/detalle/bdh0000112794.

encodingDesc.p: The original PDF file has been processed with OCR. The software used was ABBYY Finereader 12 Professional, with Spanish as recognition language.
Where applicable, the orthography has been modernized, typos have been corrected and gaps filled.
